name: Open Financial Connectivity File
summary: Learn about .OFC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft discontinued sales of Microsoft Money in June 2009 then ended support for the software in January 2011.

description: Financial data format developed by Microsoft as an open format for exchanging data with other financial programs; replaced by the .OFX format in 1997 and is not supported by MS Money 2005 or later.
